GalleryContent.Body: Use a common shared network folder within an office environment for easy collaboration.
Presets allow you to keep track of different states of your graph by capturing the values of its input nodes.
Select groups of nodes and automatically generate the corresponding Design Script code.

Search algorithms have been improved so that you can quickly search for nodes without using the Library.Right-click (or Shift+ Double-click) over the canvas to bring up search. Hovering over search results reveals helpful tooltips.
Smooth color shading can now be applied to surfaces with the Display.BySurfaceColors node.
Several improvements have been made to Dynamo, including: - Localization to twelve languages - Four new chapters have been added to the Dynamo Primer - New and updated Nuget packages for developers
